Class CareerStaffUI

java.lang.Object
CareerStaffUI
public class CareerStaffUI extends Object
Handles the console-based user interface flow for career centre staff. This class coordinates login, menu navigation and actions such as approving company representatives, processing student withdrawals and managing internship opportunities.

  • Constructor Details

    • CareerStaffUI

      public CareerStaffUI(CareerStaffDbMgr careerStaffDbMgr, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr, InternshipWithdrawalDbMgr internshipWithdrawalDbMgr, InternshipUI internshipUi, CompanyRepDbMgr companyRepDbMgr, CareerStaffController careerStaffController, CareerStaffPasswordMgr careerStaffPasswordMgr)
      Creates a new CareerStaffUI and starts the interaction flow. The constructor performs login, then repeatedly shows the menu and handles user choices until the user quits or login fails too many times.
      Parameters:
      careerStaffDbMgr - database manager for career staff
      internshipDbMgr - database manager for internships
      internshipWithdrawalDbMgr - database manager for internship withdrawals
      internshipUi - UI component for internship-related actions
      companyRepDbMgr - database manager for company representatives
      careerStaffController - controller handling staff actions

      Method to start and run the main career staff ui class.
      Parameters:
      sc -
      careerStaffPasswordMgr -

    • menu

      public int menu(Scanner sc)
      Displays the main menu and reads the user's choice. Returns -1 if the choice is out of the allowed range.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      Returns:
      the chosen menu option, or -1 if invalid

    • login

      public CareerStaff login(Scanner sc, CareerStaffPasswordMgr careerStaffPasswordMgr)
      Prompts the user for staff ID and password and attempts to log in.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      careerStaffPasswordMgr - password manager used for validation
      Returns:
      the logged-in CareerStaff if successful; null otherwise

    • approveCompanyRepApplication

      public void approveCompanyRepApplication(Scanner sc)
      Handles the flow for approving or rejecting a company representative application. Prompts for a representative ID and an approve/reject choice.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input

      Parameters:

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(CareerStaff careerStaff, Scanner sc, CareerStaffPasswordMgr careerStaffPasswordMgr)
      Prompts the user to change their password and attempts to update it using the provided password manager.
      Parameters:
      careerStaff - the logged-in staff whose password is changed
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      careerStaffPasswordMgr - password manager used to perform the change
